sentence: A  man  in  uniform  wearing  a  kippah  is  heading  towards  the  place  where  remains  of  people  killed  in  the  massacre  by  the  militant  group  Hamas  on  October  7  have  been  brought  for  identification.
I  ask  you  to  respect  the  dead,"  says  a  member  of  the  Israel  Defense  Forces,  Lehi,  who  is  only  authorized  to  give  her  first  name.
Truck  after  truck  full  of  human  remains  of  those  murdered  when  Hamas  stormed  across  the  border  from  Gaza.
Many  of  the  people  identifying  and  caring  for  the  dead  are  military  reservists.
We're  seeing  bodies  that  were  mutilated  after  they  were  already  dead.
